<h3 id="X8715">X(8715)&nbsp;=&nbsp; CIRCUMNORMAL-ISOGONAL CONJUGATE OF X(40)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; ((b - c)*(3*a^3 - 5*a^2*b + a*b^2 + b^3 - 5*a^2*c - 2*a*b*c - b^2*c + a*c^2 - b*c^2 + c^3)) : :
<br>
<b>
X(8715) = X[40] + 3 X[3158] = X[2136] + 3 X[3576] = 3 X[3158] - X[3811] = 4 X[3628] - 3 X[3829] = X[3] - 3 X[4421] = X[3913] + 3 X[4421] = X[3189] + 3 X[5657] = 3 X[165] + X[6765] = 6 X[4421] - X[8666] = 2 X[3913] + X[8666]
</b>
<p>
</p>
<p>
X(8715) lies on these lines:
{1,88}, {2,3746}, {3,519}, {5,528}, {8,35}, {9,4015}, {10,55}, {12,6154}, {20,535}, {21,3679}, {31,3293}, {36,145}, {40,758}, {41,1018}, {42,5264}, {43,595}, {46,3870}, {56,3244}, {57,3881}, {58,3550}, {72,3689}, {78,3878}, {101,3208}, {140,3813}, {149,7741}, {165,6765}, {191,3681}, {198,3950}, {200,1005}, {227,4347}, {228,2901}, {386,5255}, {388,3256}, {411,7991}, {474,551}, {484,3868}, {496,3035}, {497,3825}, {498,3434}, {516,5812}, {517,6796}, {518,3098}, {529,550}, {536,7751}, {572,3169}, {612,3743}, {902,1724}, {910,3991}, {944,2077}, {952,5450}, {956,3625}, {958,3626}, {976,4424}, {997,1697}, {999,3635}, {1001,3634}, {1011,4685}, {1043,4276}, {1125,1376}, {1155,3555}, {1158,2801}, {1203,3240}, {1259,4304}, {1385,3880}, {1466,4315}, {1479,3814}, {1483,5854}, {1486,4078}, {1500,4386}, {1575,2241}, {1621,1698}, {1696,4098}, {1706,3918}, {1759,3930}, {1788,2078}, {2093,4757}, {2136,3576}, {2271,3997}, {2329,4262}, {2476,3584}, {2478,4309}, {2550,3841}, {2805,8143}, {2949,3174}, {2975,3632}, {3057,5440}, {3058,4187}, {3085,3822}, {3086,6681}, {3149,4301}, {3189,5657}, {3216,3915}, {3241,4188}, {3336,3873}, {3337,3889}, {3338,3892}, {3436,4302}, {3454,4660}, {3501,4251}, {3612,3872}, {3617,5251}, {3621,5288}, {3628,3829}, {3633,7280}, {3636,6767}, {3670,3938}, {3680,6940}, {3683,3697}, {3684,3730}, {3717,7295}, {3748,5439}, {3828,4428}, {3924,3987}, {3935,5904}, {3956,4512}, {4006,5282}, {4018,5183}, {4066,5695}, {4075,4557}, {4097,5847}, {4193,4857}, {4294,7080}, {4420,5692}, {4511,5697}, {4646,5266}, {4701,8168}, {4856,5120}, {4917,4973}, {4995,7483}, {5082,5218}, {5223,7676}, {5428,5690}, {5493,7580}, {5853,6684}, {5881,6906}, {6048,8616}, {6905,7982}
</p>
<p>
X(8715) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 3913}, {40, 3811}, {1158, 5534}<br>
X(8715) = reflection of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): (3813, 140), (8666, 3)<br>
X(8715) = X(2167)-Ceva conugate of X(9)<br>
X(8715) = intouch-to-ABC barycentric image of X(5)<br>
X(8715) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,4855,214), (8,35,993), (8,4189,5258), (10,55,5248), (35,5258,4189), (40,3158,3811), (46,3870,3874), (55,5687,10), (78,5119,3878), (100,3871,1), (474,3303,551), (902,3214,1724), (956,5217,5267), (997,1697,3884), (1376,3295,1125), (1479,5552,3814), (3241,4188,5563), (3625,5267,956), (3632,5010,2975), (3895,4855,1), (3913,4421,3), (4189,5258,993)
